parameters.name: Size
parameters.description: The size of the file. Unit: bytes.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: The status of the file. Valid values: SUCCESS and INIT.

parameters.name: Uuid
parameters.description: The unique ID of the file. If you do not set this parameter, the system automatically sets a UUID for you.

parameters.name: VersionId
parameters.description: The version number of the file.
